Free Shipping 1 Year Warranty 45-Day Money Back CuboAi Smart Health Bundle $459 $499 The NEW Smart Health Bundle offers technology with 3 senses for monitoring Baby's safety to ensure parents don't miss a thing. This bundle includes a CuboAi Smart Baby Monitor (3-Stand Set), a Sleep Sensor Pad, and a Smart Temp. Our Camera AI uses computer vision to watch over Baby, while working with the Sleep Sensor Pad to monitor Baby's breathing motions and the Smart Temp to detect and record Baby's body temperature in real-time. Included: CuboAi Plus Smart Baby Monitor CuboAi Sleep Sensor Pad CuboAi Smart Temp Floor Stand Crib Mount Mobile Stand 1 year of CuboAi Premium included. FREE! Free Shipping 1 Year Warranty 45-Day Money Back Payment methods More information Includes CuboAi Plus 3-Stand Set, the Sleep Sensor Pad, and our ALL NEW Smart Temp. 1 year of CuboAi Premium included. FREE! 1. For all orders placed on the CuboAi official website, standard shipping will take 3 to 10 business days. However, it might take up to 14 business days in some areas due to reasons beyond our control (e.g. courier's delivery schedules, routing, weather, road shut-downs, etc.) 2. The 3-Stand Set comes with a Mobile Stand, a Crib Mount and a Floor Stand (with a set of shared stand components between the Crib Mount and the Floor Stand). To create a complete Crib Mount set, attach the Crib Mount to the shared stand. To create a complete Floor Stand set, swap out the Crib Mount that's attached to the shared stand, and replace it with the floor base. 3. Stable Wi-Fi connection is required. We recommend Wi-Fi download/upload speed to be at least 5Mbps. 4. Smartphone is required. CuboAi App is available for the iOS and Android system. Mobile device must be iOS 14/Android 9.0 or newer. 5. CuboAi Sleep Sensor Pad must pair with a CuboAi Plus Smart Baby Monitor. 6. CuboAi Sleep Sensor Pad should be placed in the middle of the crib under the mattress. 7. The thickness of the mattress should be between 2.36" - 5.12" / 6- 13cm for optimal accuracy. For the best functionality, these mattress types work better than others: Spring Based, Coir Based, Spring/Coir Combination. For other types, please contact customer service (support@cuboai.com) for more information. 8. CuboAi Sleep Sensor Pad is a product designed to help you understand your baby's breathing motion patterns through continuous data collection and analysis. It is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose, treat or cure any disease or any other conditions, including but not limited to Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (SIDS). False readings about your baby's breathing motion patterns are potential risks of CuboAi Sleep Sensor Pad. CuboAi Sleep Sensor Pad should not be a replacement for the care of an adult or medical device of any kind. 9. Smart Temp is FDA cleared. 10. For stable temperature reading, always keep Smart Temp within 5 meters (16.4 feet) of the Smart Baby Monitor. 11. Smart Temp Tape is for one-time use only. 12. Smart Temp's charger uses rechargeable lithium-ion batteries. 13. We do not accept returns on our medical devices to protect our customers' health and safety. For return eligibility, products must be unused, sealed, and, if applicable, with the outer plastic film intact. 14. If you need to return this bundle, please make sure all items are returned together. 15. International transaction fees may apply. Our parenting-focused features reduce parental anxiety by 78% Safety Sleep Memories See how to set up the Smart Health Bundle Add-Ons 3-Stand Set How our night vision compares Leading AI technology to safeguard your baby's safety, sleep, and health CuboAi Smart Baby Monitor Traditional Baby Monitors Safety Covered-Face & Rollover Detection Breathing Motion Detection* Sleep Sleep Analytics Built-In Lullabies Health Cough Detection Continuous Body Temperature Detection* Memories Daily Highlights 18-Hr Playback with Event Tags Reassurance Picture-in-Picture Temperature and Humidity Alerts Security CTIA Cybersecurity Certified Family Sharing Who's Online & Connection History *Additional add-on products required 4.4/5 (2,985) Making parents' lives easier Influencers Amazon reviews Comes with a good quality camera and pad that has breathing motion sensors, when motion is detected the camera will pick up every movement, alerting the parent via the app that there has been motion. What impresses me the most is the accuracy and timing of the camera integrating with the AI pad. RYRY Honestly it's a such a relief to being able to track it and also having data that I can share on my pediatrician visits. This is technology at it best to put parents at ease. When it comes to my kids I always want the best. This is giving me huge piece of mind! Lerunia The pad is fantastic at putting you at ease. You can easily access a live feed off the camera when the pad detects unusual movement and act upon it if needed. For a bundle that gives you peace of mind, I don't really think you can put a price on it. I highly recommend it. Jamie Mather Rebekah Hambley @mrs.hambley Having a baby in and out of the hospital, with 10 different surgeries, feeling like she's just finally out of recovery from one surgery and she's jumping into the next one makes life very stressful! But the @cubobabymonitor has made us feel so much more at ease knowing we can monitor Rosie so closely while she's sleeping. The clear crisp image plus the sleep sensor pad let's us know that Rosie is safe but also alerts us when Rosie needs our help!" Karlyn Tawar @houseoftawar The setup is super simple, all you have to do is slide the sleep sensor pad under the babies mattress and connect it through the app, that's it! With the combined breathing motion sensor pad and the CuboAi monitor I get complete peace of mind and am alerted if I need to check on the baby allowing her to sleep in peace without me bugging her or any intrusive devices attached to her! Elena Gant So my favorite feature of this pad is basically one-time installation. You go put it under baby's mattress and basically forget it. It's super easy and you don't have to set it up every time baby's in the crib...it's going to sense every little motion your baby makes, when the baby yawns, or breathing, or moving and it's going to alert you if something goes wrong. Beth Grace Moore @bethgracemoore [Sleep Sensor Pad] is non-contact, non-intrusive so it goes where they are already sleeping. You don't need additional wearables for this thing to work and it's kind of a set-it-and-forget-it. You put it under there, and you can just trust that you have all of the analytics that you need about your baby's sleep. Look into the details All features Specs Frequently Asked Questions 1. Does CuboAi/CuboAi Plus require Wi-Fi? Yes! CuboAi/CuboAi Plus is a Wi-Fi camera and needs to be connected to your home Wi-Fi network to connect to our App and the cloud. This way you can fully utilize our features! 2. How do I set up my CuboAi Plus? Please refer to the Quick Start Guide - 3-Stand Set or Quick Start Guide - Wall Mount Set for assembly instructions. 3. How do Covered-Face and Rollover Alerts work? It's quite simple. Based on Baby's movement, positioning, and face visibility in the crib, CuboAi/CuboAi Plus will determine if an alert needs to be sent. In the event that our camera detects Baby rolling over or Baby's mouth and/or nose is covered, an alert will be sent to parents through our App. 4. Does CuboAi support multiple logins? Of course! CuboAi supports up to 8 concurrent logins. You and your family members can check in on your little one using our App from anywhere, any time –as long as you're connected to the Internet. Additionally, as long as you're logged into our App, all notifications will be sent to your phone. All purchases of CuboAi Plus Smart Baby Monitor come with one year of CuboAi Care Premium Plan included, which begins when you pair your product to the CuboAi App for the first time. Do not pair your product until you are ready for the subscription period to begin. The subscription period will expire one year after pairing, after which you will no longer be subscribed to a CuboAi Care Plan and will only have access to basic camera functions. You may manually renew your Premium Plan subscription or upgrade to Ultimate Plan at the then-current price (which may vary from the current price). Current prices can be found above. If a customer does not want to use the CuboAi Care Premium included with purchase, the customer can contact customer support to cancel the subscription. However, by canceling the included subscription, the customer is voiding the subscription and will need to pay the then-current price if customer chooses to re-activate. Cubo Ai Smart Baby Monitor Regular price $299.00 Nayeli R. This camera has been nothing but amazing! It has met all my needs I was looking for in a baby monitor. I have own this cute baby camera for almost a year now and it still works amazing since day 1. The picture quality is clear day and night. The alerts are spot on when my little one rolls over or cries. I also love how it grows with my child. I would definitely recommend to anyone expecting or is currently looking for a new baby monitor. I promise you won't be disappointed in this camera. It's the cutest and best addition to any nursery. Chi We bought our Cubo from Taiwan originally because of the feature that you can share the account with up to 8 people. This way, our family can see our baby whenever they want. The video quality is quite good and its night vision is perfect. It has many safety monitoring features you can choose to use such as rollover, cover mouth, etc. and you can set up the appropriate sensitivity for crying detection. I like that it uses a cute birdy sound to alert you so that you don't have to constantly watch the video and still know what's going on. One other great feature I love is that it will automatically take photos and videos of our baby so that we can save cute moments on our phone. It also monitors room temperature and humidity quite accurately, which is very useful to keep an optimal sleeping environment for our baby. The other good thing is that they have excellent customer service - always respond to our questions and request quickly. We have been using it for 6-month now and everything runs great. I would recommend it :) Rudy Great baby monitor my wife and I get a lot more rest now knowing cubo is helping us watch our baby the notifications are awesome ! Captures everything so far Zachary R. "Amazing baby monitor. It gives me the peace of mind knowing that I will be alerted if my baby rolls over onto her stomachs. I love that it can be viewed on my phone and I can watch my baby while I am at work. The app is a bit quirky at times but the devs are working constantly to improve it." Apexle "I didn't think this was all that necessary when we first got it, since we had already received another really well reviewed baby monitor as a gift at a baby shower. That one had its own monitor that would be charged so you could view it real time without having to use your phone. The resolution was a bit low on that one, but we didn't need to use our phone to view it (nor could we since it didn't allow connection to a phone). But other than that, I wouldn't be able to tell what had happened in the past or even in the last few seconds unless I happened to be looking at the monitor at that moment. So when our friend got us this, it seemed redundant at first, but we figured at least we could use it with our phones in case we weren't home (since the other monitor required you to be within a certain distance). But thats where Cubo excels; the software automatically takes photo snapshots and even small video clips and saves them to a temporary cloud which you can download within a certain time. There would be clips and photos back multiple days and you can even scroll through the days (and nights) to see what has happened since then. You'd be surprised at all the little highlights that you might miss while your baby is in the crib. I think that was one of the key points to Cubo, the software that can sometimes accurately detect your baby crying or if its face is covered. Eventually, my wife and I ended up using the Cubo exclusively, and only use the other baby monitor if we needed to use our phones or was busy with something else and didn't want to drain the phone battery. Otherwise, we use Cubo to not only check up on baby but also to see what baby has been doing in the past. We can even share limited functions to family so they can see baby at specific times or we can disable it when we want privacy for our baby., Overall a really great product and they update the software often as well according to community feedback. I hope they continue to update their software and update it often, they've been doing a good job and listnening to customer feedback so far." Magnolia I got Cubo through its Indiegogo launch, and we are loving it! The picture quality is amazing, and the photo/video capture feature is just very cool. The app is very user friendly and has a great user interface. Also, the in-app chat feature to get help with any questions or concerns has been quick and very helpful- great service from the Cubo folks!! A couple other advantages I've specifically liked: I can mirror the live feed to my AppleTV, and the notification sounds (birds chirping) are clever but also ensure you hear them since they are different from any other notification sound you might normally have. Plus, the actually hardware (the Cubo bird) is SUPER cute in the nursery! Robert K. W. Cool features, it's nice to receive a notification when something is happening to our 4 months old, even when you're not home ! The camera and mic quality is good, it also records everything so you can go back in time and see what happened. It has a cute night light you can switch on and off in the app that is very well designed and very user friendly! Alexandria I have only had the monitor for about 2 days now and I am in LOVE! I love the many features it has compared to my Motorola non-wifi monitor I had 3 years ago with my first. My favorite feature is that I can use my phone and still have the audio in the background so that if I hear anything I can quickly go right back to the live stream. There is a small delay in audio but almost non existent. Quality is great! If you're looking for a monitor to watch over the crib and not the entire room than this one is perfect! Titzu W. This is a nice product that I like the real time monitor with simply an app. It's really easy to use and control the camera. Setting up crying alert is convinient. However openining up the app make take seconds, and sometimes lost connections depend on internet stability. Better buy this with good internet connection throughout the room you want to monitor. Jordan W. "We use this product to keep our family in touch. Grandparents can open up the app to check in on the little ones and even talk to them! The app has been intuitive to use and the alerts keep me up to date on baby. Setup was a breeze. We were able to get even some non-tech savvy family connected with almost no issue. There is a small delay in the stream, but it hasn't been a problem for us. Bottom line: This monitor has been great. Highly recommended." Sabrina I absolutely love this monitor! It is truly the VIP of baby monitor! It is so easy to install, quick and ready to go. The cute bird like feature fit our room decor. The picture quality is clear both during the day and at night, especially it got the light too. I like that it has the temperature feature gives me piece of mind knowing that it isn't too hot or too cold for my baby. I can see everything on my phone plus the talk back feature is great for our baby boy. I truly love this product!!! Hsu D. I own a Levana baby monitor at home but it doesn't come with built-in wifi functionality so I decided to purchase a Cubo AI to try it out. Love the temperature and humidity detection as my daughter has dry skin and her room is on the cooler side of our house. I turn on the portable heater and humidifier in the room and check the app to find that my daughter is sleeping in the most comfortable room temperature, leaving me a piece of mind throughout the night. The physical set up of the monitor, wifi, and app set up on my phone was super easy. The HD quality of the camera is very clear during the daytime and the night sight is impressive. The motion and sound alerts are super clear without any delay. As a new mom, I wish I had known Cubo AI sooner! :) I highly, HIGHLY recommend this product! You will only need just this ONE Cubo AI and you're good for the rest of the years to go! Devin "This is a solid 4.5 star monitor. Tl;dr - Get this monitor. You won't be disappointed. Great performance. High quality. Room for improvement on inconsequential items. The monitor itself does everything I expected it to do, so I'd be remiss to give it anything less than 5-stars, but the rest of the experience has some room for improvement (which is to be expected with a product that's relatively new to market.) I already have the Owlet sock (not the cam), so the three key things I wanted: 1. Access via phone/smart device - I didn't want to have to carry around a separate monitor that would have limited range. Yes, this has the security implications of someone hacking your data, but welcome to the 21st century. 2. ""Environment info"", e.g. temperature - We live in the Pacific Northwest, so winters are cold enough that we need to run the furnace, which has variable performance in different rooms. Even though the thermostat might be set to 72, I want to know that the room is safe/comfy for my baby. 3. Notifications - I figured this would be a no-brainer with any smart-device enable monitor. Apparently not. Cubo hits all of these areas, so there is my 5-star satisfaction. Now, more details on the good: - Video quality: I'm able to zoom in and get all the details I'd expect. - App performance: I typically only have a .5 second lag on the live video stream, and notifications (baby crying, potential face cover) are within 1-2 seconds. Given I'm getting this for safety reasons (knowing if something is wrong), this is crucial. Other smart devices I have in my house have a 5-20 second delay, so I'm impressed by how seamless Cubo's notifications are. - Versatility: The fact that this comes with three different ""mounting"" options (floor stand, crib mount, mobile stand) was one of the contributing factors of me getting a Cubo over the Nanit. More on that below. I love the idea that I can use this well after my child is out of their crib. - Covered face/rollover detection: From what I understand, this is the only unit that does this. I've only receive a couple of these notifications, and while the baby wasn't actually in direct harm, they definitely had turned over enough that I was glad to be alerted. - Customer service: I ordered this on Amazon before their big ""US Amazon launch"", which had a coupon associated with it. A little disappointed that I purchased while the coupon was being advertised, but before it was active, I reached out and they were very responsive and made sure to do right by me as a customer. Very impressed. Also, there is a good community on Facebook where other users discuss success stories/questions, which is nice. Neither good nor bad: - Number of notifications: Again, comparing to other smart devices I have in my house (e.g. Ring doorbell, Wyze cam, etc), I'm used to ""false positives"", i.e. alerts that are technically accurate but don't require my attention. So far, all the alerts I get from Cubo are accurate (baby is crying, baby's face might be covered, can't detect baby). However, more often than not, I'm aware because I'm in the room. The alerts are customizable (you can set what you want to be alerted for), but I'd rather be able to toggle notifications on/off entirely. If the baby is in the crib and I'm in the room folding laundry, I don't want notifications. If I'm watching a movie, I want all the notifications. For context, I've received 83 notifications in the past 36 hours. To improve: - The physical setup: Specifically, setting up the floor stand required using more force to get the pieces together than I'd like (it made me feel like I was doing something wrong or was about to break something). You have to feed the cord through each piece a little bit at a time in order for the pieces to fit together, and the cord didn't really slide well, making me think it wasn't supposed to move. The unit felt sturdy afterwards. - Packaging: Admittedly I've become a little spoiled in this area with other hi-tech gadgets and their clean unpacking experience. This wasn't terrible, but my biggest complaint is that there are three mounting options (crib mount, floor stand, mobile mount - which is actually a great thing!), but there isn't a nice way to store the other two while not in use. The initial box is far too large to just tuck away in a closet. I'd love some way to either nest the yet-to-be-used pieces and/or a simple holding case that you can tuck away until you need them. - UX of the app: As stated above, the performance of the app is incredible. However, the layout (UI) is not intuitive, and the overall UX has too much going on when you first open the app. The random photos it takes are fun, but are just that...random. Maybe 1 in 10 is one I'd like to keep. Several are just the back of my wife's head as she's either getting baby out of the bassinet or putting him down. Overall, I would still recommend this over other monitors I've researched (e.g. Owlet cam, nanit plus, miku, etc). This doesn't have the baby health vitals, which would be a huge plus (I also use the Owlet sock to get heart rate and O2), and between those two I have total peace of mind. I opted for Cubo over Nanit plus (which gives the breathing rate) mainly because of cost and versatility. Cubo was nearly half as much as the Nanit plus, and the Nanit was not as versatile as the Cubo (i.e. you're not able to move the Nanit around after you mount it). I opted for Cubo over the Owlet cam (despite having the sock) because Owlet cam didn't give notifications on the phone (and also, cost)." Jessica C. My husband came to be while still pregnant and mentioned this Kickstarter for a baby cam and at first I was hesitant but after seeing the video and all the features I knew this would be perfect. I suffer from anxiety and being a new mom is really scary so for me to have cubo notify me for dangers really sets my anxiety at ease and I can sleep through the night knowing she's okay. I'd highly recommend this product for not only a baby monitor but it grows with your child later on in life so you can always know they are safe Herman l. Extremely happy with Cubo. I have my Dad in South Africa connected to Cubo too, so he's able to get daily snaps, and live video and see his granddaughter grow up in Canada. My favorite part about Cubo is being able to look back at what happen while my son was sleeping with the 18 hour playback. Chelsea M. Let me just say that I couldn't be happier with the overall design, quality and customer service behind this sweet little crib cam. It's so easy to call it the Cubo Crib cam, but it is that and so much more! It is an absolute life changer. My husband works out of town 2 or 3 weeks out of the month, so the ability to download the app and login/access live feed anytime is a blessing! Oh, and the two way audio... has us swooning! Cubo AI Smart Baby Monitor truly made my new motherhood easier. Am very thankful to have found Cubo AI and be able to use it as a pilot user... So far, no complaints or major breakdowns..
